properties.entry: SELECT TOURBOARD_NO ,TOURBOARD_TITLE ,TOUR_COUNT ,TOURBOARD_CONTENT ,FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME THUMBNAIL FROM TOURBOARD B JOIN PHOTO ON (TOURBOARD_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE B.TOUR_STATUS='Y' AND FILE_LEVEL=5 ORDER BY PHOTO_NO DESC
UPDATE TOURBOARD SET TOUR_COUNT = TOUR_COUNT+1 WHERE TOURBOARD_NO=? AND TOUR_STATUS='Y'
SELECT TOURBOARD_NO , TOURBOARD_TITLE ,TOURBOARD_CONTENT ,USER_ID ,TOURCREATE_DATE FROM TOURBOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO=TOURBOARD_WRITER) WHERE TOURBOARD_NO = ? AND B.TOUR_STATUS ='Y'
SELECT PHOTO_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM PHOTO WHERE REF_BNO = ?
SELECT * FROM(SELECT TOURBOARD_TITLE,TOURBOARD_CONTENT,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH FROM TOURBOARD JOIN PHOTO ON (TOURBOARD_NO=REF_BNO)) WHERE ROWNUM < 4
